sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react'
import {BrowserRouter, Routes, Route} from 'react-router-dom'
import { AuthContextProvider } from './contexts/AuthContext'
import { AuthContext } from './contexts/AuthContext'
import Signup from './pages/Signup'
import Login from './pages/Login'
import Navbar from './components/Navbar'
import Home from './components/Home'
import Publish from './pages/Publish'
import Card from './components/Card'
import Comment from './components/Comment'
import Blog from './pages/Blog'
import './App.css'
const App = () => {
  const {authState} = useContext(AuthContext)
  return (
    <>
      <AuthContextProvider>
        <BrowserRouter>
          <Navbar/>
          <Routes>
            <Route path="/" element={<Home/>} />
            <Route path="/signup" element={<Signup/>} />
            <Route path="/login" element={<Login/>} />
            <Route path="/write" element={<Publish/>} />
            <Route path="/read/:blogId" element={<Blog/>}/>
          </Routes>
        </BrowserRouter>
        {fetch("http://localhost:2000/blog/comment/fetch",{
      method:'PATCH',
      body:JSON.stringify({blog:'3a2ac8b9-1731-11ee-bd29-f80dac236bf2'}),
      headers:{
        "Authorisation": `Bearer ${authState}`,
        "Content-type": "application/json"
      }
    }).then(data=>data.json()).then(data=>{
      data.map(dat=><Comment id={dat.id} content={dat.content} author={dat.author} likes={dat.likes} liked={dat.liked}/>)
    }).catch(err=>console.log("err"))}
      </AuthContextProvider>
    </>
  )
}

export default App
